short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fluid and aesthetic new tab page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Customize your web-surfing experience by using Value, a calm and fluid new tab page. 

These tessellated tiles soothingly switch between colors and gradients with a soft and subtle motion every time you open a new tab.

Switch through the different presets depending on your mood!

From Cold Beach, to Coffee Cream, to Color TV, there's a color set for each mood you have.
